title: Morde Runes
body: For Morde so I go Resolve, Precision or Sorcery? Also what champs are Precision and Inspiration for? Idk how to make those decisions.

Generally morde goes Conq, however Aftershock is also great on him, as for the inspiration and stuff, inspiration works on most all champions, biscuits are very useful, and the boots are amazingly useful on champions that rush a first item (usually stuff like ADCs, which overall lack mobility, the boots helps with that), precision is a scaling rune set, stuff like alacrity. It works great on early game champions so they can scale later into the game.

great ty. so its not like written in stone, there could be multiple runes that work with a champ? Also is aftershock under Sorcery?

Aftershock is resolve, and no! Runes are not set in stone! All the time I try out different combinations on Ivern, dont let yourself feel like you have to be confined to one rune page just because its "meta", play what you like how you like.

aftershock is under resolve 

conqueror is taken 93.5% of games with a 51.9% win rate 

https://lolalytics.com/ranked/worldwide/9.17/platinum/plus/champion/Mordekaiser/

An example of this would be like Fiora or Camille, they can take stuff like Conqueror, Resolve, or Inspiration for their mains rune page, and any combination of stuff for their secondary, no one rune page is set in stone for a champion! If you have any questions for a champion you like, you can always join the *insert champion name here* mains reddit, and or discord server (Each individual champions main discord server can be found through the lol discord server (invite code: discord.gg/lol))

your preferred keystones should be Conqueror (tanks/bruisers), Fleet Footwork (ranged opponents), or Phase Rush. Best second pages come down to preference but generally I prefer to take Domination for Ravenous Hunter and either Taste of Blood or the poro wards. 

Resolve is viable as either and is probably what You should take in bad matchups.

I go Conqueror, Triumph, Alacrity, and Cut down, with the healing runes in Domination, or Shield Bash and Revitalize/Overgrowth in Resolve.

I find taking Grasp and Shield Bash to be hella fucking fun on Morde.

Build up that shield meter then pull 'em in! Bonk em with that P H A T shield bash and grasp proc. 

And building tank doesn't stop you from taking Rylai's since it helps you stack HP too :) which IMO is a core item on him no matter what. adding a 20% slow on his passive is just TOO. GOOD. to not build.
